scripts.sync: robocopy dist docs /MIR /NFL /NDL /NJH /NJS /nc /ns /np & if %ERRORLEVEL% LSS 8 (exit /B 0) else (exit /B 1)
scripts.build:sync: npm run build && npm run sync
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run sync && git add docs && git commit -m "build: update docs for GitHub Pages" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy:main: npm run build && npm run sync && git add docs && git commit -m "build: update docs for GitHub Pages" && git push -u origin main
